pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fizz Buzz Implementation // An implementation of the Fizz Buzz algorithm, as defined e.g. in https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fizz_buzz. It provides the standard algorithm with 3 replaced by Fizz and 5 replaced by Buzz, with the option of specifying start and end numbers, step size and the numbers being replaced by fizz and buzz, respectively. This package gives interviewers the optional answer of "I use fizzbuzzR::fizzbuzz()" when interviewing rather than having to write an algorithm themselves.
